meanings.definition: In a powerless or ineffective manner.
meanings.sent1: She impotently tried to lift the heavy box, but it wouldn't budge.
meanings.sent2: He impotently watched as his team lost the game.
meanings.sent3: The kitten impotently pawed at the toy, unable to make it move.
meanings.sent4: The wind impotently blew against the sturdy oak tree.
meanings.sent5: The child impotently tugged at the locked door, unable to open it.

meanings.sent1: The impotently light breeze barely rustled the leaves.
meanings.sent2: She felt impotently weak after being sick for days.
meanings.sent3: The old car sputtered impotently before finally starting.
meanings.sent4: The impotently built bridge collapsed under the weight of the truck.
meanings.sent5: His impotently attempts to open the jar proved futile.

meanings.definition: Lacking the ability to produce a desired effect.
meanings.sent1: The impotently medicine did nothing to relieve her pain.
meanings.sent2: His impotently words failed to convince anyone.
meanings.sent3: The impotently flashlight flickered and went out in the dark.
meanings.sent4: The impotently engine refused to start on the cold morning.
meanings.sent5: Her impotently efforts to fix the leak only made it worse.
